formula: T(n, m) = sum (A008284(n, k), k=m..n).G.f. for m-th column: sum(x^(n)/product(1-x^k, k=1..n+m-1), n=1..infty).T(n, m) = sum {k=1..n} A207379(k, m). - _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 22 2012
